title: The Shadow People
description: THE INVASION OF THE HALLUCINOGENIC PEOPLE FROM UNDEREARTH!They had existed from time immemorial, hidden in a space warp far beneath the surface of the earth. Until now, their only form of nourishment had been a strange hallucinogenic grain. Now, they hungered for human flesh. The earth was to be their stockyards and mankind their meat...(Cover art by Jeffrey Catherine Jones)
author: Margaret St. Clair
